Title: Relates to the release of certain surveillance footage to law enforcement agencies
Summary: Requires businesses that possess surveillance footage relevant to an ongoing law enforcement investigation into a felony offense believed to have been committed on the premises of such business shall immediately release such surveillance footage to a law enforcement agency upon receipt of a formal written request by the law enforcement agency; establishes exceptions to the requirement to immediately release footage; establishes penalties.
LawCode: Add ยง393-g, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the release of certain surveillance footage to law enforcement agencies
